data.name: JSON Tree Recursive Sort
data.description:
Sort the following JSON string:

'{"australia":{"western australia":{"margeret river":["wollyabra"]},"south australia":["barossa"],"victoria":["yarra valley"],"new south wales":["hunter valley"],"queensland":[],"tasmania":[],"australian capital territory":[],"northern territory":[]},"france":{"bordeaux":{"st emmilion":["gran crue"]},"burgundy":{"cote de nuits":{"chambolle musigny":["le musigny"]}}}}'

Into an array of arrays structure that resembles the following:

[
 [['France', 'france']]
 [['Bordeaux', 'bordeaux', class: 'france'], ['Burgundy', 'burgundy', class: 'france']]
 [['St Emmilion', 'st emmilion', class: 'bordeaux'], ['Cote De Nuits', 'cote de nuits', class: 'burgundy']]
 [['Gran Crue', 'gran crue', class: 'st emmilion'], ['Chambolle Musigny', 'chambolle musigny', class: 'cote de nuits']]
 [['Le Musigny', 'le musigny', class: 'chambolle musigny']]
]
